department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Request for Proposal for 350 MHz Oscilloscope (K3D44-240243B)
duration_in_months: ><Fatal issue. The solicitation closing date and time are both on February 12th, 2024, which can lead to unexpected outcomes due to time zone differences. Please adjust the solicitation closing date and time to ensure fairness and avoid potential issues.
full_summary:
## Notice of Request for Proposal

**Title**: 350 MHz Oscilloscope (K3D44-240243B)

**Reference Number**: WS4367731482-Doc4414779650

**Publication Date**: January 26, 2024

**Closing Date**: February 12, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Note:**  This is a second call for proposals, superseding the original solicitation dated December 22, 2023 with a closing date of January 15, 2024 at 2 pm EST.

**Purpose:**
This Request for Proposal (RFP) is seeking a supplier to provide a 350 MHz oscilloscope for Environment and Climate Change Canada.

**Limitations:**

* Only suppliers holding Supply Arrangement # E60HN-16ELEC are eligible to participate in this procurement.
* Suppliers who have been pre-qualified on the aforementioned supply arrangement have been invited to submit a proposal.
* This procurement is limited to the purchase of electrical and electronic products.

**Specifications:**
* The oscilloscope must have a frequency range of 350 MHz.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Supplied oscilloscopes must meet the specified frequency range.
* Other factors may be considered in the evaluation process.

**Bid Submissions:**

* Proposals must be submitted electronically on or before February 12, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be considered.

**Communication:**
For further information, please contact:

* Cheng, Sabrina (SPAC/PSPC)
Phone: None (note: personal phone number was not available)
Email:  [sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sabrina.cheng@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Additional Information:**

* The procuring entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) at 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request for non-successful bidders
* The proposed goods will be delivered to Environment and Climate Change Canada at 200 Boulevard Sacré-Coeur, Gatineau, QC, J8X 4C6

**Attachments:**
None (attached)

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to trade agreements between Canada and other parties.

**Link:**
